Description: Middle East Healthcare Co (known as: Saudi German Hospital) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since March 2016. Saudi German Hospital operates within the Health Care Equipment & Services Sector focusing on Health Care Facilities. It has one Subsidiary operating across Saudi Arabia focusing on Health Care Facilities. Saudi German Hospital is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2004.

Shareholder Name: Bait Al Batterjee Medical Co Ltd
The Arab Fund for Economic and Social Development
Khalid Abduljaleel Ibrahim Batterjee and Partners for Medical Investments Ltd
Sobhi Abduljaleel Ibrahim Batterjee and Partners for Medical Business Ltd
Saudi Indian Company for Cooperative Insurance
